attributes.action: Policy : Set up  a British ARPA - Advanced Research Projects Agency to fund innovation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Innovation drives the economy .ARPA a government funded scheme was founded in late 50's in the US to fund innovation  , it is estimated that between one third and one half of all innovations in computing and technology are funded by ARPA . ARPA changed the world when it invented the ARPANET the forerunner of the internet .  ARPA was set up to mine concepts and ideas from around the world  , concepts who's time had come . ARPA's mandate is to help individuals and companies to bridge the valley of death which demands short term returns on capital . ARPA holds no equity , but is charged with  a long term vision generating advantage through lead time expertise. ARPA is not unique to the US . Finland has implemented a similar scheme ,  the result world class companies .
